author: WandaWoman
title: Comment on A dramatic reading of “Breaking Cardinal Rules” by WandaWoman
text:
Article written by Mrs. Tyler Thompson No, I will not make you a sandwich, but you can follow me on Twitter @MrsTylerKSR or email me . 18 responses to “A dramatic reading of “Breaking Cardinal Rules”” Zaphod October 7, 2015 at 8:21 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Well this is the best thing ever. I wonder???? October 7, 2015 at 8:22 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Do you think Jared Lorenzen could win the hotdog eating competition???? Its a serious question. 34 Cat October 7, 2015 at 8:26 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Holy Moly – this is the greatest – and I do mean the GREATEST segment in the history of KSR. Well done – well done, indeed. Allison October 7, 2015 at 8:32 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Well that was the best 7 minutes of my day! James October 7, 2015 at 8:32 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Dedicated to Tard Nation…get those banners on velcro, those bitches be coming down faster than Benhaen on a water bong. 
LC14nication 4LIFE October 7, 2015 at 8:35 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Maybe the best thing KSR has ever done. Well played. MacGruber October 7, 2015 at 8:41 pm | Permalink | Reply 
They need to close that ho house down! Useless Knowledge October 7, 2015 at 8:42 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Mrs. Tyler, great job putting this together. You and fake Lou Holtz are awesome. Rick October 7, 2015 at 8:49 pm | Permalink | Reply 
This is brilliant. Thank you KSR. I’m going to nominate it for a Grammy! PatPattersonISwalkingthruthatdoor October 7, 2015 at 8:50 pm | Permalink | Reply 
OK, now we really need to have Obrzut on KSR live to discuss UofL’s Lack of Prostitutional Control Rick October 7, 2015 at 8:50 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Grand Slam! October 7, 2015 at 8:52 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Really fine work y’all. Beautiful. Tommycatsfan October 7, 2015 at 8:57 pm | Permalink | Reply 
I won’t sleep tonight because I can’t stop watching this. This is beautiful !!! Thank you KSR! Thank you. This is a keeper and a classic! Thank God we have UL in this state! Catsall October 7, 2015 at 9:04 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Drop the mic…..you ain’t beating this shit Burntblue727 October 7, 2015 at 9:19 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Fake Lou Holtz wins hands down! But that was great by all indeed. Memphis UK Cat October 7, 2015 at 9:34 pm | Permalink | Reply 
OMG, love you KSR! The best! jc October 7, 2015 at 9:41 pm | Permalink | Reply 
THAT is setting the bar HIGH! Epic KSR. October 7, 2015 at 9:43 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Y’all are seriously crazy!! And I love you for it!!! Post Comment - New and Improved (not really, it just works now)
